title: Calories in Tonic Water
meta_description: Learn calories in tonic water per 200ml serving, including carbs, sugars, sodium, and comparisons to diet versions for better choices.
assumptions: Regular sweetened tonic water (e.g., Schweppes-style), carbonated, no added flavors; 200ml as standard serving size.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, sugar content, and quinine levels. Diet versions differ significantly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 200ml serving of tonic water contains about 70 kcal, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 200ml glass of tonic water?
Is tonic water high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 17 g sugars in 200ml, similar to a soda.
Typically 0-1 kcal per 200ml, sweetened with artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: Does tonic water have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, 0 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: Why is sodium in tonic water?
faqs.a: From added sodium benzoate or natural minerals; about 30 mg per 200ml.
